personality_types.name: The Analyst
personality_types.description: Highly logical and analytical, thrives on data and objective reasoning.

personality_types.name: The Diplomat
personality_types.description: Empathetic and cooperative, values harmony and relationships.

personality_types.name: The Sentinel
personality_types.description: Dependable and responsible, values tradition and stability.

personality_types.name: The Explorer
personality_types.description: Spontaneous and energetic, loves adventure and new experiences.

personality_types.name: The Commander
personality_types.description: Confident and assertive, natural leader with a clear vision.

personality_types.name: The Advocate
personality_types.description: Idealistic and principled, driven by a strong sense of justice.

personality_types.name: The Mediator
personality_types.description: Reflective and caring, deeply values personal connections and inner harmony.

personality_types.name: The Architect
personality_types.description: Innovative and strategic, enjoys designing systems and long-term planning.

personality_types.name: The Consul
personality_types.description: Sociable and caring, enjoys helping others and organizing social gatherings.

personality_types.name: The Virtuoso
personality_types.description: Practical and hands-on, enjoys working with tools and solving practical problems.

personality_types.name: The Entertainer
personality_types.description: Fun-loving and spontaneous, enjoys being the center of attention.

personality_types.name: The Executive
personality_types.description: Organized and driven, enjoys managing projects and people.

personality_types.name: The Campaigner
personality_types.description: Enthusiastic and creative, loves inspiring others and exploring new ideas.

personality_types.name: The Logistician
personality_types.description: Detail-oriented and reliable, enjoys working with data and processes.

personality_types.name: The Caregiver
personality_types.description: Compassionate and nurturing, enjoys supporting and caring for others.

personality_types.name: The Visionary
personality_types.description: Imaginative and strategic, enjoys dreaming big and planning for the future.
